resources.string: Sanctuary app allows users to effortlessly share their favorite songs and curated playlists with friends, fostering a vibrant and interconnected community of music enthusiasts.

I Am Muhammad Syahrun Dalu, Officialy from Gorontalo, Indonesia. Now I Study in Universitas Komputer Indonesia, and my major is Informatics Engineering. Besides, I am a freelancer that already holds more than 20 Clients since 2019. My Skills that help the client so far are brand designer and full-stack Website Developer. And as a hobby music is still my first place to hang out with time.
